channel.description:

I have no pictures, because I got on the server, got off, and the run is not working. So you will have to fix that. The server is made to my liking though and hopfuly yours.

item.title: Live Vill V1 Download Open source
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Your really going to try to fight over this?

You need to do a little more research before you start a fight over who made the server.

Evidence that it is czar

1.public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

Evidence 2.

public String cannonowner;

Evidence 3.

[code]
public void earthrobes() {
int EnemyX2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;

    if (misc.random(5) == 1) {
        sendMessage("Your earth robes begin to glow.");
        sendMessage("You strike the enemy and deal damage!");
        hitDiff = misc.random(40);
        setAnimation(811);
        stillgfx(367, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
    }
}

public void firerobes() {
    int EnemyX2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
    int EnemyY2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;

    if (misc.random(5) == 1) {
        sendMessage("Your fire robes begin to glow.");
        sendMessage("You strike the enemy and deal damage!");
        hitDiff = misc.random(40);
        setAnimation(811);
        stillgfx(481, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
    }
}

public void airrobes() {
    int EnemyX2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
    int EnemyY2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;

    if (misc.random(5) == 1) {
        sendMessage("Your air robes begin to glow.");
        sendMessage("You strike the enemy and deal damage!");
        hitDiff = misc.random(40);
        setAnimation(811);
        stillgfx(198, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
    }
}

public void waterrobes() {
    int EnemyX2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
    int EnemyY2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;

    if (misc.random(5) == 1) {
        sendMessage("Your water robes begin to glow.");
        sendMessage("You strike the enemy and deal damage!");
        hitDiff = misc.random(40);
        setAnimation(811);
        stillgfx(5, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
    }
}[/code]

I can get more if you want me to. You need to add credits were they are due.

[quote=“Jgdm, post:9, topic:315899”]Ahh okay. Well I have never heard of that, so how could I possible use their source, considering it took me 2 months…
Thank you cocoa for telling me what czar is.[/quote]

Czar is all sources that are based on allstar, reapage, ragescape, almost all servers that are not devolution or delta are czar. And you can tell czar from a devolution and delta.

Read full topic
